text: “Ndipo amene angasamuke pa njira ya Allah (chifukwa cha chipembedzo chake,) apeza malo ambiri m’dzikomo othawira ndikupeza bwino. Ndipo amene angatuluke m’nyumba mwake kuti asamuke chifukwa cha Allah ndi Mtumiki Wake, kenako nkumpeza imfa (m’njira), ndithu malipiro ake atsimikizika kwa Allah. Ndithudi, Allah Ngokhululuka kwambiri, Ngwachisoni chosatha
